cluster_domain.description: The internal cluster domain. Defaults to `cluster.local`.

components.description: Toolkit components to include in the install manifests.

components_extra.description: List of extra components to include in the install manifests.

image_pull_secrets.description: Kubernetes secret name used for pulling the toolkit images from a private registry. Defaults to ``.

log_level.description: Log level for toolkit components. Defaults to `info`.

namespace.description: The namespace scope for install manifests. Defaults to `flux-system`.

network_policy.description: Deny ingress access to the toolkit controllers from other namespaces using network policies. Defaults to `true`.

path.description: Expected path of content in git repository.

registry.description: Container registry where the toolkit images are published. Defaults to `ghcr.io/fluxcd`.

target_path.description: Relative path to the Git repository root where Flux manifests are committed.

toleration_keys.description: List of toleration keys used to schedule the components pods onto nodes with matching taints.

watch_all_namespaces.description: If true watch for custom resources in all namespaces. Defaults to `true`.

block.description: `flux_install` can be used to generate Kubernetes manifests for deploying Flux.

branch.description: Default branch to sync from. Defaults to `main`.

commit.description: The Git commit SHA to checkout, if specified Tag filters will be ignored.

git_implementation.description: The git implementation to use, can be `go-git` or `libgit2`. Defaults to ``.

interval.description: Sync interval in minutes. Defaults to `1`.

kustomize_path.description: Expected path of kustomize content in git repository.

name.description: The kubernetes resources name Defaults to `flux-system`.

namespace.description: The namespace scope for this operation. Defaults to `flux-system`.

path.description: Expected path of content in git repository.

secret.description: The name of the secret that is referenced by GitRepository as SecretRef. Defaults to `flux-system`.

semver.description: The Git tag semver expression, takes precedence over `tag`.

tag.description: The Git tag to checkout, takes precedence over `branch`.

target_path.description: Relative path to the Git repository root where the sync manifests are committed.

block.description: `flux_sync` can be used to generate manifests for reconciling the specified repository path on the cluster.
